body.p: We E R Eskridge G. W. Beard and G. P. Jolly do certify that Thomas W Dyer is now under Bond for disloyalty that he while Bowling Green was occupied by Gen Buckner left the County with some 10 or 12 Going men alt all of which except two Joined the Rebele army as we under stand some time after the Rebbles was driven out of the State he returned Home
We also certify that he was Justice of the Peace at the time of his leaving the State and continued acting as such after his return. Given under our hands this 7th day of May 1863

E R, Eskridge Presiding Judge
G. W Beard Sheriff
G. P. Jolly County Court Clerk
I John P. Haswell Certify that from the the above is true and believe that It will do as an inquiry to have him commissioned as he has been active in the Rebel cause
John. P. Haswell Dept U S. collecte for Breckenridge Co.
